fields.description:
JIRA tracking YARN related security issues.

Moving over YARN only stuff from MAPREDUCE-3101.

RM-NM secret-keys should be randomly generated and rolled every so often

comments.body:
Resolving this very old umbrella JIRA. Security (auth + authz) has largely been nearly complete/stable in YARN since this ticket was opened. And as new requirements come in, we can open new tickets.
 - Will leave the open sub-tasks as they are.
 - Unassigning from me given multiple contributors on the tasks.
 - No fix-version as this was done across releases.
